name: Satan Is Knocking On My Door (Director's Cut)
name_original: Satan Is Knocking On My Door (Director's Cut)
description:
A version of Satan Is Knocking On My Door with explanations on the world and my thought process while writing the game.  

Confused about the geography of Hell? Ever wonder what the prize really was? Want to read the intensely personal anecdotes that inspired the game? Find out here!
